    • calculateSoldGoods

      int calculateSoldGoods​(LocalDate graduationDate, int goodsNr, int graduationCount)
      This method determines the theoretical number of goods sold. Without loss of theft, damaged goods or the like.
      Parameters:
      graduationDate - End of day date
      goodsNr - The name of the goods.
      graduationCount - The amount counted at the end of the day.
      Returns:
      The sold goods.

    • calculateRevenue

      This method determines the total price of the goods sold.

      goodsNr - The goods nr.
      numberSoldGoods - The number of goods sold.
      Returns:
      Income from goods sold.
